messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Officer, there's an emergency at the Bank of America on Laurel Canyon, north of Kittridge.
Can you provide more details about the situation?
Yes, we have shots fired at the Bank of America. There are two suspects, heavily armed and wearing body armor.
Are you or anyone else with you injured?
I believe there are officers down. The suspects are armed with AK-47s and are shooting at everything.
Stay calm. Units are responding code 3. Can you see the suspects' location now?
One suspect is outside the bank, moving toward the parking lot. The other might still be inside.
Keep at a safe distance. Officers are en route. Do not approach the suspects.
I can see the suspect's vehicle. It's a white car with an open trunk, parked near the north side of the bank.
Noted. We need to keep the area clear. Where exactly are you now?
I'm behind a tree, north of Archwood on Laurel Canyon. I can see more civilians getting caught in the crossfire.
Keep yourself covered and away from the line of fire. Multiple units are en route. We'll get help to you soon.
Understood. They're still firing at the officers. One suspect is now moving eastbound, out of the parking lot.
Alright. The air unit has eyes on them. We need all units to maintain a safe distance and allow SWAT to handle the suspects.
Can we get more help? There are injured officers and civilians.
Ambulances are on standby, and additional units are being notified. We need to keep the area secure.
The officers are pinned down, and one suspect is still shooting at them from behind the white vehicle.
Noted. SWAT is being notified. All units maintain your positions until SWAT arrives.
The suspect with the white vehicle is moving again, heading east on Archwood.
Units, keep a safe distance and follow the suspect. The air unit will provide updates on the suspect's movements.
Alright, they're still firing. This is chaotic. Civilians are in danger.
All units, shots are still being fired. Civilians are in danger. Maintain distance. Help is on the way.
One suspect is trying to escape. We need to secure the area.
All units, suspect attempting to flee. Secure the perimeter and avoid engagement until SWAT arrives.
Understood. We'll hold positions.
